articles.title: World Cup: Back in Shubman Gill’s sprawling village home near Indo-Pak border, his grandparents recall tales of little ‘Shub’ before big final - The Indian Express
articles.description: The elderly couple — grandfather Sardar Didar Singh and grandmother Gurmail — guard a cement strip in Chak Khere Wala village where Shubman Gill first took guard.
articles.content: Enjoying the mild warmth of the sun on a cloudy November afternoon, 87-year-old Sardar Didar Singh is lying on a cot in his front yard, watching a video clip of his grandson Shubman Gill pulverising … [+5349 chars]

articles.title: ISRO’s next ambitious plan: Collect soil samples from Moon, bring them to Earth - The Indian Express
articles.description: The samples will be collected from the Shiv Shakti point where the Chandrayaan-3 lander had touched down on the lunar south pole, the space agency said.
articles.content: In September this year, NASA succeeded in obtaining the first-ever samples from the near-Earth asteroid, Bennu. This was enabled by its OSIRIS-REx spacecraft, which re-entered the Earth’s atmosphere … [+2164 chars]

articles.title: 'Overestimated, they were Hamas terrorists': Israeli official on revised war toll - India Today
articles.description: Israeli PM Benjamin Netanyahu's advisor Mark Regev has said several "badly burnt bodies" were initially assumed to be Israeli civilians. They were later identified as Hamas terrorists, after which the war toll was revised from 1,400 to 1,200.
